post.body: Evangeline just said "Mrs. Delynn is gonna be jealous of my new apron cuz' it's so Bling-ish"
just saw your butt slap to me from yesterday. THanks, right back at-cha!! Merry Christmas!
did you pay ur bill? JK.
im rockin the red heels in honor of you.
whoa oh oh woah ah oh woah ah oh
http://twitpic.com/wc44 - The No Place team at Hutch's house bring some Christmas
http://twitpic.com/wc2b - Bringing some Christmas to Wanda's house.
http://twitpic.com/wc10 - What it looks like when the No Place team assends on mrs. Wanda's house.
150 soups handed out before 9am! 30 more to pass out around town. Tks HPC n pastor @Dinorizzo from the homeless peeps of BR. Now 2 the levee
http://twitpic.com/wbjo - Susan n Joshua, he came to homeless bkf. Cuz parents were sleeping.
soup is almost gone and its only 8am.
http://twitpic.com/wb9a - More elves serving coffee n muffins to the homeless.
http://twitpic.com/wb7l - Elves serving the homeless on Christmas
http://twitpic.com/wats - Steele w his deoderant, his favorite gift
E is playing her records and very happy about her bedazzled apron. We are all excited about outreach that starts at 7am..nap later for sure.
Steele asked Santa for fake snakes but didn't want to get them out of his stockings and now wont touch them. Likes his bike and drum.
Presents have been opened, coffee brewing, getting ready for homeless outreach.
http://twitpic.com/w2z4 - YEA BOOKS!! I can finally read @llhargrove 's book!!
I love that I have become a verb..."@caroleturner-ing" I know it wasn't meant as a compliment but I'm taking it as one. Thanks @daddygriffis
Be at the abandoned UPT restaurant on Florida Blvd tomorrow morning at 7:00am if you want to help bring Christmas to the Homeless.
